title.rendered: Air Leisure Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Air Leisure – Ceased and suspended operations on 22 October 2018

Air Leisure is an Egyptian charter airline headquartered in Cairo at based at Cairo International Airport. It connects several Asian cities, mainly in China, with Egyptian leisure destinations.

 

 

Air Leisure Address: 177 Al Orouba St., Heliopolis,Cairo, Egypt

Air Leisure Phone Number : +2 (02) 2269 9681, +2 (02) 2269 9682

Fax: +2 (02) 2269 9683

Email: info@air-leisure.com

Air Leisure Official website: http://www.air-leisure.com/

Air Leisure Fleet

  • Airbus A330 – 200
  • A340 – 200
  • A330 – 200

 Queries handled Air Leisure Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Leisure Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Leisure : (click on the stars below)
